name: Rob and Laura and Friends Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Sally gets involved with a fellow named Anthony Stone. He's a mortician with a secret. What is it?
questions.explanation:
He's married.

	There's a great bit where Rob and Laura are having a conversation about Stone. They don't know, however, that they're not talking about the same thing: Laura knows he's a mortician, but Rob knows he's married.

questions.text: Laura goes on TV and reveals a secret about Alan Brady. What is it?
options: He steals jokes from other comedians
questions.explanation:
He's bald.

	This is one of the most popular episodes of the series. "Coast to Coast Big Mouth" is the title.

questions.text: An old portrait of Laura suddenly turns up. Where does Rob want it to go?
questions.correct: To an owner who lives high on a mountaintop
questions.explanation:
To an owner who lives high on a mountaintop.

	Laura is nude (although she didn't pose that way). Carl Reiner does a nice turn as an off-the-wall artist.

questions.text: Laura meets an old boyfriend; Rob also meets him (at the golf course). What has happened to the boyfriend?
options: He's been married and divorced several times
questions.explanation:
He became a priest.

	Rob is jealous and Laura is uneasy - until they discover that he's no longer a "competitor".

questions.text: Which of the following played a playboy entertainer who tries to hit on Laura?
questions.explanation:
Richard Dawson.

	It was an early role for a young "Dick Dawson". Morris appeared as an army buddy in one episode; he also appeared as a neighbor in another episode (in which Rob thought each had the other's baby). Ingels played an army buddy. Vaughn played an old acquaintance.

questions.text: One of Rob's relatives leaves him a special gift. The clue is in a song. What is the song?
questions.explanation:
Me and My Shadow.

	The shadow (in the photograph that Rob finds) belongs to Abraham Lincoln.

questions.text: Rob suspects that Buddy may be seeing another woman. He's not. Who is he really seeing?
questions.explanation:
A rabbi.

	Buddy decides to go for a Bar Mitzvah. He's a bit embarrassed (because of his age), so he keeps it a secret.

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT a victim of a practical joke in the "candid camera" tradition?
questions.explanation:
Mel.

	Rob, Laura, Buddy and Sally are all scared silly by Mel.

questions.text: Danny Thomas has a cameo as an alien from another planet. What is characteristic of these aliens?
questions.correct: Eyes in the back of their heads
questions.explanation:
Eyes in the back of their heads.

	This is the episode that features Laura sliding out of a closet atop a sea of walnuts.

questions.text: Laura works for the "Alan Brady Show" as a dancer. Who was absolutely bowled over by how good she looked in her dancing clothes?
questions.explanation:
Jamie Farr.

	Farr plays a delivery boy who flips when he sees Laura in costume. The others appeared in other episodes. Rickles played a hold-up man (and prisoner), Eisley played a new neighbor, Damone played a guest star on the "Alan Brady Show".
